comment: Russia-China keeps pushing its aggression on Western Europe. This is not to the benefit of either Russia or the West, but China surely benefits. Did Putin get played?
amr:
# ::snt Russia-China keeps pushing its aggression on Western Europe. This is not to the benefit of either Russia or the West, but China surely benefits. Did Putin get played?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / keep-02
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Russia"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "China")))
            :ARG1 (p / push-02
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (a2 / aggression
                        :poss a)
                  :ARG2 (w / world-region
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Western"
                              :op2 "Europe"))))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (t / this)
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 c
                        :op2 w
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "West"))))
      :ARG2 (b2 / benefit-01
            :ARG0 (c4 / country
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "China"))
            :ARG1-of (s / sure-02))
      :snt3 (p2 / play-08
            :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Putin"))))

comment: More shilling for Israel from our resident fake pro-White. It is not China and Russia being aggressive on the doorstep of Europe it is Israel. And the whole world knows it.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / shill-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / reside-01

                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Israel")))
                  :ARG0-of (f / favor-01
